          <title>
            <string language="sl">Religije - križanka</string>
            <string language="en">Religions - crossword</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religionen - Kreuzworträtsel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Religions - mots croisé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Religiões - crossword</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Religioni - parole incrociate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θρησκείες - σταυρόλεξο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Religiones - crucigrama</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Križanka sestavljena iz besed povezanih z religijami.</string>
            <string language="en">Crossword puzzle build of terms related to the religions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">religija</string>
            <string language="en">religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">bog</string>
            <string language="en">god</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">križanka</string>
            <string language="en">crossword</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kreuzworträtselbau von Bezeichnungen stand auf 
den Religionen in Verbindung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La construction de jeu de mots croisé des 
limites a associé aux religions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A configuração do enigma de crossword dos 
termos relacionou-se às religiões.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La configurazione di cruciverba dei termini si è
riferita alle religioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατασκευή γρίφων σταυρόλεξων των όρων σχετικών με τις
θρησκείες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La estructura del crucigrama de términos se 
relacionó con las religiones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gott</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
